description: Provides rich language support for JavaScript and TypeScript.

javascript.autoClosingTags.description: Enable/disable automatic closing of JSX tags.
javascript.autoClosingTags.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.autoClosingTags.enabled#` instead.

javascript.format.enable.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.enable#` instead.

javascript.format.indentSwitchCase.description: Indent case clauses in switch statements. Requires using TypeScript 5.1+ in the workspace.
javascript.format.indentSwitchCase.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.indentSwitchCase#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaD.description: Defines space handling after a comma delimiter.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaD.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaDelimiter#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterConstr.description: Defines space handling after the constructor keyword.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterConstr.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterConstructor#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterFuncti.description: Defines space handling after function keyword for anonymous functions.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterFuncti.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterFunctionKeywordForAnonymousFunctions#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywor.description: Defines space handling after keywords in a control flow statement.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywor.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywordsInControlFlowStatements#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing empty braces.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingEmptyBraces#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing JSX expression braces.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingJsxExpressionBraces#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty braces.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingNonemptyBraces#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty brackets.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingNonemptyBrackets#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty parenthesis.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingNonemptyParenthesis#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing template string braces.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingTemplateStringBraces#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterSemico.description: Defines space handling after a semicolon in a for statement.
javascript.format.insertSpaceAfterSemico.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterSemicolonInForStatements#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAf.description: Defines space handling after a binary operator.
javascript.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAf.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAfterBinaryOperators#` instead.

javascript.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunct.description: Defines space handling before function argument parentheses.
javascript.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunct.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunctionParenthesis#` instead.

javascript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.description: Defines whether an open brace is put onto a new line for control blocks or not.
javascript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForControlBlocks#` instead.

javascript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.description: Defines whether an open brace is put onto a new line for functions or not.
javascript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForFunctions#` instead.

enumDescriptions: Don't insert or remove any semicolons.
Insert semicolons at statement ends.
Remove unnecessary semicolons.
javascript.format.semicolons.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.semicolons#` instead.

javascript.inlayHints.functionLikeReturn.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.functionLikeReturnTypes.enabled#` instead.

enumDescriptions: Disable parameter name hints.
Enable parameter name hints only for literal arguments.
Enable parameter name hints for literal and non-literal arguments.
javascript.inlayHints.parameterNames.ena.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.parameterNames.enabled#` instead.
javascript.inlayHints.parameterNames.ena.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for parameter names:
```typescript

parseInt(/* str: */ '123', /* radix: */ 8)
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

javascript.inlayHints.parameterNames.sup.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.parameterNames.suppressWhenArgumentMatchesName#` instead.
javascript.inlayHints.parameterNames.sup.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

javascript.inlayHints.parameterTypes.ena.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.parameterTypes.enabled#` instead.
javascript.inlayHints.parameterTypes.ena.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for implicit parameter types:
```typescript

el.addEventListener('click', e /* :MouseEvent */ => ...)
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

javascript.inlayHints.propertyDeclaratio.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.propertyDeclarationTypes.enabled#` instead.

javascript.inlayHints.variableTypes.enab.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.variableTypes.enabled#` instead.
javascript.inlayHints.variableTypes.enab.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for implicit variable types:
```typescript

const foo /* :number */ = Date.now();
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

javascript.inlayHints.variableTypes.supp.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.variableTypes.suppressWhenTypeMatchesName#` instead.
javascript.inlayHints.variableTypes.supp.markdownDescription: Suppress type hints on variables whose name is identical to the type name.

javascript.preferGoToSourceDefinition.description: Makes `Go to Definition` avoid type declaration files when possible by triggering `Go to Source Definition` instead. This allows `Go to Source Definition` to be triggered with the mouse gesture.
javascript.preferGoToSourceDefinition.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferGoToSourceDefinition#` instead.

javascript.preferences.autoImportFileExc.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.autoImportFileExcludePatterns#` instead.
javascript.preferences.autoImportFileExc.markdownDescription: Specify glob patterns of files to exclude from auto imports. Relative paths are resolved relative to the workspace root. Patterns are evaluated using tsconfig.json [`exclude`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#exclude) semantics.

javascript.preferences.autoImportSpecifi.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.autoImportSpecifierExcludeRegexes#` instead.
javascript.preferences.autoImportSpecifi.markdownDescription:
Specify regular expressions to exclude auto imports with matching import specifiers. Examples:

- `^node:`
- `lib/internal` (slashes don't need to be escaped...)
- `/lib\/internal/i` (...unless including surrounding slashes for `i` or `u` flags)
- `^lodash$` (only allow subpath imports from lodash)

javascript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.description: Preferred path style for auto imports.
javascript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.importModuleSpecifier#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Prefers a non-relative import only if one is available that has fewer path segments than a relative import.
Prefers a relative path to the imported file location.
Prefers a non-relative import based on the `baseUrl` or `paths` configured in your `jsconfig.json` / `tsconfig.json`.
Prefers a non-relative import only if the relative import path would leave the package or project directory.

javascript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.description: Preferred path ending for auto imports.
javascript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.importModuleSpecifierEnding#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Use project settings to select a default.
Shorten `./component/index.js` to `./component`.
Shorten `./component/index.js` to `./component/index`.
Do not shorten path endings; include the `.js` or `.ts` extension.

javascript.preferences.jsxAttributeCompl.description: Preferred style for JSX attribute completions.
javascript.preferences.jsxAttributeCompl.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.jsxAttributeCompletionStyle#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Insert `={}` or `=""` after attribute names based on the prop type. See `#javascript.preferences.quoteStyle#` to control the type of quotes used for string attributes.
Insert `={}` after attribute names.
Only insert attribute names.

javascript.preferences.organizeImports.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.organizeImports#` instead.
javascript.preferences.organizeImports.markdownDescription: Advanced preferences that control how imports are ordered.

accentCollation.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Compare characters with diacritical marks as unequal to base character.

caseFirst.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`, and `organizeImports.caseSensitivity` is not `caseInsensitive`. Indicates whether upper-case will sort before lower-case.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Default order given by `locale`.
Upper-case comes before lower-case. E.g. ` A, a, B, b`.
Lower-case comes before upper-case. E.g.` a, A, z, Z`.

caseSensitivity.markdownDescription: Specifies how imports should be sorted with regards to case-sensitivity. If `auto` or unspecified, we will detect the case-sensitivity per file
markdownEnumDescriptions: Detect case-sensitivity for import sorting.
Sort imports case-insensitively.
Sort imports case-sensitively.

locale.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Overrides the locale used for collation. Specify `auto` to use the UI locale.

numericCollation.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Sort numeric strings by integer value.

typeOrder.markdownDescription: Specify how type-only named imports should be sorted.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Detect where type-only named imports should be sorted.
Type only named imports are sorted to the end of the import list. E.g. `import { B, Z, type A, type Y } from 'module';`
Named imports are sorted by name only. E.g. `import { type A, B, type Y, Z } from 'module';`
Type only named imports are sorted to the beginning of the import list. E.g. `import { type A, type Y, B, Z } from 'module';`

unicodeCollation.markdownDescription: Specify whether to sort imports using Unicode or Ordinal collation.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Sort imports using the numeric value of each code point.
Sort imports using the Unicode code collation.

javascript.preferences.quoteStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.quoteStyle#` instead.
javascript.preferences.quoteStyle.markdownDescription: Preferred quote style to use for Quick Fixes.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Infer quote type from existing code
Always use single quotes: `'`
Always use double quotes: `"`

javascript.preferences.renameMatchingJsx.description: When on a JSX tag, try to rename the matching tag instead of renaming the symbol. Requires using TypeScript 5.1+ in the workspace.
javascript.preferences.renameMatchingJsx.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.renameMatchingJsxTags#` instead.

javascript.preferences.useAliasesForRena.description: Enable/disable introducing aliases for object shorthand properties during renames.
javascript.preferences.useAliasesForRena.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.useAliasesForRenames#` instead.

javascript.referencesCodeLens.enabled.description: Enable/disable references CodeLens in JavaScript and TypeScript files. This CodeLens shows the number of references for classes and exported functions and allows you to peek or navigate to them.
javascript.referencesCodeLens.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.enabled#` instead.

javascript.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllF.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllFunctions#` instead.
javascript.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllF.markdownDescription: Enable/disable the [references CodeLens](#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.enabled) on all functions in JavaScript and TypeScript files.

javascript.suggest.autoImports.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.autoImports#` instead.

javascript.suggest.classMemberSnippets.e.description: Enable/disable snippet completions for class members.
javascript.suggest.classMemberSnippets.e.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.classMemberSnippets.enabled#` instead.

javascript.suggest.completeFunctionCalls.description: Complete functions with their parameter signature.
javascript.suggest.completeFunctionCalls.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.completeFunctionCalls#` instead.

javascript.suggest.completeJSDocs.description: Enable/disable suggestion to complete JSDoc comments.
javascript.suggest.completeJSDocs.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.completeJSDocs#` instead.

javascript.suggest.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.enabled#` instead.

javascript.suggest.includeAutomaticOptio.description: Enable/disable showing completions on potentially undefined values that insert an optional chain call. Requires strict null checks to be enabled.
javascript.suggest.includeAutomaticOptio.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.includeAutomaticOptionalChainCompletions#` instead.

javascript.suggest.includeCompletionsFor.description: Enable/disable auto-import-style completions on partially-typed import statements.
javascript.suggest.includeCompletionsFor.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.includeCompletionsForImportStatements#` instead.

javascript.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns#` instead.
javascript.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns.markdownDescription: Enable/disable generating `@returns` annotations for JSDoc templates.

javascript.suggest.names.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.names#` instead.
javascript.suggest.names.markdownDescription: Enable/disable including unique names from the file in JavaScript suggestions. Note that name suggestions are always disabled in JavaScript code that is semantically checked using `@ts-check` or `checkJs`.

javascript.suggest.paths.description: Enable/disable suggestions for paths in import statements and require calls.
javascript.suggest.paths.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.paths#` instead.

javascript.suggestionActions.enabled.description: Enable/disable suggestion diagnostics for JavaScript files in the editor.
javascript.suggestionActions.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggestionActions.enabled#` instead.

javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabl.description: Enable/disable automatic updating of import paths when you rename or move a file in VS Code.
javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabl.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Prompt on each rename.
Always update paths automatically.
Never rename paths and don't prompt.

javascript.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled#` instead.
javascript.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled.markdownDescription: Automatically update imports when pasting code. Requires TypeScript 5.6+.

js/ts.autoClosingTags.enabled.description: Enable/disable automatic closing of JSX tags.

js/ts.format.enabled.description: Enable/disable the default JavaScript and TypeScript formatter.

js/ts.format.indentSwitchCase.description: Indent case clauses in switch statements. Requires using TypeScript 5.1+ in the workspace.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaDelimi.description: Defines space handling after a comma delimiter.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterConstructor.description: Defines space handling after the constructor keyword.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterFunctionKey.description: Defines space handling after function keyword for anonymous functions.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywordsInC.description: Defines space handling after keywords in a control flow statement.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndB.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing empty braces.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing JSX expression braces.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty braces.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty brackets.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty parenthesis.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing template string braces.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterSemicolonIn.description: Defines space handling after a semicolon in a for statement.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterTypeAsserti.description: Defines space handling after type assertions in TypeScript.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAfterBi.description: Defines space handling after a binary operator.

js/ts.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunctionPa.description: Defines space handling before function argument parentheses.

js/ts.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForC.description: Defines whether an open brace is put onto a new line for control blocks or not.

js/ts.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForF.description: Defines whether an open brace is put onto a new line for functions or not.

enumDescriptions: Don't insert or remove any semicolons.
Insert semicolons at statement ends.
Remove unnecessary semicolons.

js/ts.hover.maximumLength.description: The maximum number of characters in a hover. If the hover is longer than this, it will be truncated. Requires TypeScript 5.9+.

js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.enabled.description: Enable/disable implementations CodeLens in TypeScript files. This CodeLens shows the implementers of TypeScript interfaces.

js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.showOnAllC.markdownDescription: Enable/disable showing [implementations CodeLens](#js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.enabled) above all TypeScript class methods instead of only on abstract methods.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.checkJs.markdownDescription: Enable/disable semantic checking of JavaScript files. Existing `jsconfig.json` or `tsconfig.json` files override this setting.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.experimental.markdownDescription: Enable/disable `experimentalDecorators` in JavaScript files that are not part of a project. Existing `jsconfig.json` or `tsconfig.json` files override this setting.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.module.markdownDescription: Sets the module system for the program. See more: https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#module.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.strict.markdownDescription: Enable/disable [strict mode](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#strict) in JavaScript and TypeScript files that are not part of a project. Existing `jsconfig.json` or `tsconfig.json` files override this setting.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.strictFuncti.markdownDescription: Enable/disable [strict function types](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#strictFunctionTypes) in JavaScript and TypeScript files that are not part of a project. Existing `jsconfig.json` or `tsconfig.json` files override this setting.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.strictNullCh.markdownDescription: Enable/disable [strict null checks](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#strictNullChecks) in JavaScript and TypeScript files that are not part of a project. Existing `jsconfig.json` or `tsconfig.json` files override this setting.

js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.target.markdownDescription: Set target JavaScript language version for emitted JavaScript and include library declarations. See more: https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#target.

enumDescriptions: Disable parameter name hints.
Enable parameter name hints only for literal arguments.
Enable parameter name hints for literal and non-literal arguments.
js/ts.inlayHints.parameterNames.enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for parameter names:
```typescript

parseInt(/* str: */ '123', /* radix: */ 8)
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

js/ts.inlayHints.parameterNames.suppress.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

js/ts.inlayHints.parameterTypes.enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for implicit parameter types:
```typescript

el.addEventListener('click', e /* :MouseEvent */ => ...)
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

js/ts.inlayHints.variableTypes.enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for implicit variable types:
```typescript

const foo /* :number */ = Date.now();
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

js/ts.inlayHints.variableTypes.suppressW.markdownDescription: Suppress type hints on variables whose name is identical to the type name.

js/ts.preferGoToSourceDefinition.description: Makes `Go to Definition` avoid type declaration files when possible by triggering `Go to Source Definition` instead. This allows `Go to Source Definition` to be triggered with the mouse gesture.

js/ts.preferences.autoImportFileExcludeP.markdownDescription: Specify glob patterns of files to exclude from auto imports. Relative paths are resolved relative to the workspace root. Patterns are evaluated using tsconfig.json [`exclude`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#exclude) semantics.

js/ts.preferences.autoImportSpecifierExc.markdownDescription:
Specify regular expressions to exclude auto imports with matching import specifiers. Examples:

- `^node:`
- `lib/internal` (slashes don't need to be escaped...)
- `/lib\/internal/i` (...unless including surrounding slashes for `i` or `u` flags)
- `^lodash$` (only allow subpath imports from lodash)

js/ts.preferences.importModuleSpecifier.description: Preferred path style for auto imports.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Prefers a non-relative import only if one is available that has fewer path segments than a relative import.
Prefers a relative path to the imported file location.
Prefers a non-relative import based on the `baseUrl` or `paths` configured in your `jsconfig.json` / `tsconfig.json`.
Prefers a non-relative import only if the relative import path would leave the package or project directory.

js/ts.preferences.importModuleSpecifierE.description: Preferred path ending for auto imports.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Use project settings to select a default.
Shorten `./component/index.js` to `./component`.
Shorten `./component/index.js` to `./component/index`.
Do not shorten path endings; include the `.js` or `.ts` extension.

enumDescriptions: Search dependencies based on estimated performance impact.
Always search dependencies.
Never search dependencies.
js/ts.preferences.includePackageJsonAuto.markdownDescription: Enable/disable searching `package.json` dependencies for available auto imports.

js/ts.preferences.jsxAttributeCompletion.description: Preferred style for JSX attribute completions.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Insert `={}` or `=""` after attribute names based on the prop type. See `#js/ts.preferences.quoteStyle#` to control the type of quotes used for string attributes.
Insert `={}` after attribute names.
Only insert attribute names.

js/ts.preferences.organizeImports.markdownDescription: Advanced preferences that control how imports are ordered.

accentCollation.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Compare characters with diacritical marks as unequal to base character.

caseFirst.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`, and `organizeImports.caseSensitivity` is not `caseInsensitive`. Indicates whether upper-case will sort before lower-case.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Default order given by `locale`.
Upper-case comes before lower-case. E.g. ` A, a, B, b`.
Lower-case comes before upper-case. E.g.` a, A, z, Z`.

caseSensitivity.markdownDescription: Specifies how imports should be sorted with regards to case-sensitivity. If `auto` or unspecified, we will detect the case-sensitivity per file
markdownEnumDescriptions: Detect case-sensitivity for import sorting.
Sort imports case-insensitively.
Sort imports case-sensitively.

locale.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Overrides the locale used for collation. Specify `auto` to use the UI locale.

numericCollation.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Sort numeric strings by integer value.

typeOrder.markdownDescription: Specify how type-only named imports should be sorted.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Detect where type-only named imports should be sorted.
Type only named imports are sorted to the end of the import list. E.g. `import { B, Z, type A, type Y } from 'module';`
Named imports are sorted by name only. E.g. `import { type A, B, type Y, Z } from 'module';`
Type only named imports are sorted to the beginning of the import list. E.g. `import { type A, type Y, B, Z } from 'module';`

unicodeCollation.markdownDescription: Specify whether to sort imports using Unicode or Ordinal collation.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Sort imports using the numeric value of each code point.
Sort imports using the Unicode code collation.

js/ts.preferences.preferTypeOnlyAutoImpo.markdownDescription: Include the `type` keyword in auto-imports whenever possible. Requires using TypeScript 5.3+ in the workspace.

js/ts.preferences.quoteStyle.markdownDescription: Preferred quote style to use for Quick Fixes.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Infer quote type from existing code
Always use single quotes: `'`
Always use double quotes: `"`

js/ts.preferences.renameMatchingJsxTags.description: When on a JSX tag, try to rename the matching tag instead of renaming the symbol. Requires using TypeScript 5.1+ in the workspace.

js/ts.preferences.useAliasesForRenames.description: Enable/disable introducing aliases for object shorthand properties during renames.

js/ts.referencesCodeLens.enabled.description: Enable/disable references CodeLens in JavaScript and TypeScript files. This CodeLens shows the number of references for classes and exported functions and allows you to peek or navigate to them.

js/ts.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllFuncti.markdownDescription: Enable/disable the [references CodeLens](#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.enabled) on all functions in JavaScript and TypeScript files.

js/ts.suggest.classMemberSnippets.enable.description: Enable/disable snippet completions for class members.

js/ts.suggest.completeFunctionCalls.description: Complete functions with their parameter signature.

js/ts.suggest.completeJSDocs.description: Enable/disable suggestion to complete JSDoc comments.

js/ts.suggest.includeAutomaticOptionalCh.description: Enable/disable showing completions on potentially undefined values that insert an optional chain call. Requires strict null checks to be enabled.

js/ts.suggest.includeCompletionsForImpor.description: Enable/disable auto-import-style completions on partially-typed import statements.

js/ts.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns.markdownDescription: Enable/disable generating `@returns` annotations for JSDoc templates.

js/ts.suggest.names.markdownDescription: Enable/disable including unique names from the file in JavaScript suggestions. Note that name suggestions are always disabled in JavaScript code that is semantically checked using `@ts-check` or `checkJs`.

js/ts.suggest.objectLiteralMethodSnippet.description: Enable/disable snippet completions for methods in object literals.

js/ts.suggest.paths.description: Enable/disable suggestions for paths in import statements and require calls.

js/ts.suggestionActions.enabled.description: Enable/disable suggestion diagnostics for JavaScript and TypeScript files in the editor.

js/ts.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled.description: Enable/disable automatic updating of import paths when you rename or move a file in VS Code.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Prompt on each rename.
Always update paths automatically.
Never rename paths and don't prompt.

js/ts.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled.markdownDescription: Automatically update imports when pasting code. Requires TypeScript 5.6+.

js/ts.workspaceSymbols.excludeLibrarySym.markdownDescription: Exclude symbols that come from library files in `Go to Symbol in Workspace` results. Requires using TypeScript 5.3+ in the workspace.

enumDescriptions: Search all open JavaScript or TypeScript projects for symbols.
Only search for symbols in the current JavaScript or TypeScript project.
js/ts.workspaceSymbols.scope.markdownDescription: Controls which files are searched by [Go to Symbol in Workspace](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/editingevolved#_open-symbol-by-name).

typescript.autoClosingTags.description: Enable/disable automatic closing of JSX tags.
typescript.autoClosingTags.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.autoClosingTags.enabled#` instead.

typescript.check.npmIsInstalled.markdownDescription: Check if npm is installed for [Automatic Type Acquisition](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/working-with-javascript#_typings-and-automatic-type-acquisition).

typescript.disableAutomaticTypeAcquisiti.markdownDescription: Disables [automatic type acquisition](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/working-with-javascript#_typings-and-automatic-type-acquisition). Automatic type acquisition fetches `@types` packages from npm to improve IntelliSense for external libraries.

typescript.enablePromptUseWorkspaceTsdk.description: Enables prompting of users to use the TypeScript version configured in the workspace for Intellisense.

typescript.experimental.useTsgo.markdownDescription: Disables TypeScript and JavaScript language features to allow usage of the TypeScript Go experimental extension. Requires TypeScript Go to be installed and configured. Requires reloading extensions after changing this setting.

typescript.format.enable.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.enable#` instead.

typescript.format.indentSwitchCase.description: Indent case clauses in switch statements. Requires using TypeScript 5.1+ in the workspace.
typescript.format.indentSwitchCase.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.indentSwitchCase#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaD.description: Defines space handling after a comma delimiter.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaD.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterCommaDelimiter#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterConstr.description: Defines space handling after the constructor keyword.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterConstr.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterConstructor#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterFuncti.description: Defines space handling after function keyword for anonymous functions.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterFuncti.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterFunctionKeywordForAnonymousFunctions#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywor.description: Defines space handling after keywords in a control flow statement.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywor.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywordsInControlFlowStatements#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing empty braces.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingEmptyBraces#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing JSX expression braces.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingJsxExpressionBraces#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty braces.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingNonemptyBraces#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty brackets.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingNonemptyBrackets#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty parenthesis.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingNonemptyParenthesis#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.description: Defines space handling after opening and before closing template string braces.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterOpenin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeClosingTemplateStringBraces#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterSemico.description: Defines space handling after a semicolon in a for statement.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterSemico.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterSemicolonInForStatements#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterTypeAs.description: Defines space handling after type assertions in TypeScript.
typescript.format.insertSpaceAfterTypeAs.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceAfterTypeAssertion#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAf.description: Defines space handling after a binary operator.
typescript.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAf.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAfterBinaryOperators#` instead.

typescript.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunct.description: Defines space handling before function argument parentheses.
typescript.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunct.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunctionParenthesis#` instead.

typescript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.description: Defines whether an open brace is put onto a new line for control blocks or not.
typescript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForControlBlocks#` instead.

typescript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.description: Defines whether an open brace is put onto a new line for functions or not.
typescript.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLin.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForFunctions#` instead.

enumDescriptions: Don't insert or remove any semicolons.
Insert semicolons at statement ends.
Remove unnecessary semicolons.
typescript.format.semicolons.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.format.semicolons#` instead.

typescript.implementationsCodeLens.enabl.description: Enable/disable implementations CodeLens in TypeScript files. This CodeLens shows the implementers of TypeScript interfaces.
typescript.implementationsCodeLens.enabl.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.enabled#` instead.

typescript.implementationsCodeLens.showO.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.showOnAllClassMethods#` instead.
typescript.implementationsCodeLens.showO.markdownDescription: Enable/disable showing [implementations CodeLens](#js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.enabled) above all TypeScript class methods instead of only on abstract methods.

typescript.implementationsCodeLens.showO.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.implementationsCodeLens.showOnInterfaceMethods#` instead.

typescript.inlayHints.enumMemberValues.e.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.enumMemberValues.enabled#` instead.

typescript.inlayHints.functionLikeReturn.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.functionLikeReturnTypes.enabled#` instead.

enumDescriptions: Disable parameter name hints.
Enable parameter name hints only for literal arguments.
Enable parameter name hints for literal and non-literal arguments.
typescript.inlayHints.parameterNames.ena.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.parameterNames.enabled#` instead.
typescript.inlayHints.parameterNames.ena.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for parameter names:
```typescript

parseInt(/* str: */ '123', /* radix: */ 8)
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

typescript.inlayHints.parameterNames.sup.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.parameterNames.suppressWhenArgumentMatchesName#` instead.
typescript.inlayHints.parameterNames.sup.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

typescript.inlayHints.parameterTypes.ena.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.parameterTypes.enabled#` instead.
typescript.inlayHints.parameterTypes.ena.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for implicit parameter types:
```typescript

el.addEventListener('click', e /* :MouseEvent */ => ...)
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

typescript.inlayHints.propertyDeclaratio.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.propertyDeclarationTypes.enabled#` instead.

typescript.inlayHints.variableTypes.enab.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.variableTypes.enabled#` instead.
typescript.inlayHints.variableTypes.enab.markdownDescription:
Enable/disable inlay hints for implicit variable types:
```typescript

const foo /* :number */ = Date.now();
 
```

The text inside the ``` block is code and should not be localized.

typescript.inlayHints.variableTypes.supp.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.inlayHints.variableTypes.suppressWhenTypeMatchesName#` instead.
typescript.inlayHints.variableTypes.supp.markdownDescription: Suppress type hints on variables whose name is identical to the type name.

enumDescriptions: Use VS Code's configured display language.
Deutsch
espaol
English
franais
italiano
typescript.locale.markdownDescription: Sets the locale used to report JavaScript and TypeScript errors. Defaults to use VS Code's locale.

typescript.npm.markdownDescription: Specifies the path to the npm executable used for [Automatic Type Acquisition](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/nodejs/working-with-javascript#_typings-and-automatic-type-acquisition).

typescript.preferGoToSourceDefinition.description: Makes `Go to Definition` avoid type declaration files when possible by triggering `Go to Source Definition` instead. This allows `Go to Source Definition` to be triggered with the mouse gesture.
typescript.preferGoToSourceDefinition.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferGoToSourceDefinition#` instead.

typescript.preferences.autoImportFileExc.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.autoImportFileExcludePatterns#` instead.
typescript.preferences.autoImportFileExc.markdownDescription: Specify glob patterns of files to exclude from auto imports. Relative paths are resolved relative to the workspace root. Patterns are evaluated using tsconfig.json [`exclude`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig#exclude) semantics.

typescript.preferences.autoImportSpecifi.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.autoImportSpecifierExcludeRegexes#` instead.
typescript.preferences.autoImportSpecifi.markdownDescription:
Specify regular expressions to exclude auto imports with matching import specifiers. Examples:

- `^node:`
- `lib/internal` (slashes don't need to be escaped...)
- `/lib\/internal/i` (...unless including surrounding slashes for `i` or `u` flags)
- `^lodash$` (only allow subpath imports from lodash)

typescript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.description: Preferred path style for auto imports.
typescript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.importModuleSpecifier#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Prefers a non-relative import only if one is available that has fewer path segments than a relative import.
Prefers a relative path to the imported file location.
Prefers a non-relative import based on the `baseUrl` or `paths` configured in your `jsconfig.json` / `tsconfig.json`.
Prefers a non-relative import only if the relative import path would leave the package or project directory.

typescript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.description: Preferred path ending for auto imports.
typescript.preferences.importModuleSpeci.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.importModuleSpecifierEnding#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Use project settings to select a default.
Shorten `./component/index.js` to `./component`.
Shorten `./component/index.js` to `./component/index`.
Do not shorten path endings; include the `.js` or `.ts` extension.

enumDescriptions: Search dependencies based on estimated performance impact.
Always search dependencies.
Never search dependencies.
typescript.preferences.includePackageJso.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.includePackageJsonAutoImports#` instead.
typescript.preferences.includePackageJso.markdownDescription: Enable/disable searching `package.json` dependencies for available auto imports.

typescript.preferences.jsxAttributeCompl.description: Preferred style for JSX attribute completions.
typescript.preferences.jsxAttributeCompl.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.jsxAttributeCompletionStyle#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Insert `={}` or `=""` after attribute names based on the prop type. See `#typescript.preferences.quoteStyle#` to control the type of quotes used for string attributes.
Insert `={}` after attribute names.
Only insert attribute names.

typescript.preferences.organizeImports.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.organizeImports#` instead.
typescript.preferences.organizeImports.markdownDescription: Advanced preferences that control how imports are ordered.

accentCollation.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Compare characters with diacritical marks as unequal to base character.

caseFirst.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`, and `organizeImports.caseSensitivity` is not `caseInsensitive`. Indicates whether upper-case will sort before lower-case.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Default order given by `locale`.
Upper-case comes before lower-case. E.g. ` A, a, B, b`.
Lower-case comes before upper-case. E.g.` a, A, z, Z`.

caseSensitivity.markdownDescription: Specifies how imports should be sorted with regards to case-sensitivity. If `auto` or unspecified, we will detect the case-sensitivity per file
markdownEnumDescriptions: Detect case-sensitivity for import sorting.
Sort imports case-insensitively.
Sort imports case-sensitively.

locale.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Overrides the locale used for collation. Specify `auto` to use the UI locale.

numericCollation.markdownDescription: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Sort numeric strings by integer value.

typeOrder.markdownDescription: Specify how type-only named imports should be sorted.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Detect where type-only named imports should be sorted.
Type only named imports are sorted to the end of the import list. E.g. `import { B, Z, type A, type Y } from 'module';`
Named imports are sorted by name only. E.g. `import { type A, B, type Y, Z } from 'module';`
Type only named imports are sorted to the beginning of the import list. E.g. `import { type A, type Y, B, Z } from 'module';`

unicodeCollation.markdownDescription: Specify whether to sort imports using Unicode or Ordinal collation.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Sort imports using the numeric value of each code point.
Sort imports using the Unicode code collation.

typescript.preferences.preferTypeOnlyAut.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.preferTypeOnlyAutoImports#` instead.
typescript.preferences.preferTypeOnlyAut.markdownDescription: Include the `type` keyword in auto-imports whenever possible. Requires using TypeScript 5.3+ in the workspace.

typescript.preferences.quoteStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.quoteStyle#` instead.
typescript.preferences.quoteStyle.markdownDescription: Preferred quote style to use for Quick Fixes.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Infer quote type from existing code
Always use single quotes: `'`
Always use double quotes: `"`

typescript.preferences.renameMatchingJsx.description: When on a JSX tag, try to rename the matching tag instead of renaming the symbol. Requires using TypeScript 5.1+ in the workspace.
typescript.preferences.renameMatchingJsx.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.renameMatchingJsxTags#` instead.

typescript.preferences.useAliasesForRena.description: Enable/disable introducing aliases for object shorthand properties during renames.
typescript.preferences.useAliasesForRena.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.preferences.useAliasesForRenames#` instead.

typescript.referencesCodeLens.enabled.description: Enable/disable references CodeLens in JavaScript and TypeScript files. This CodeLens shows the number of references for classes and exported functions and allows you to peek or navigate to them.
typescript.referencesCodeLens.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.enabled#` instead.

typescript.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllF.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllFunctions#` instead.
typescript.referencesCodeLens.showOnAllF.markdownDescription: Enable/disable the [references CodeLens](#js/ts.referencesCodeLens.enabled) on all functions in JavaScript and TypeScript files.

typescript.suggest.autoImports.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.autoImports#` instead.

typescript.suggest.classMemberSnippets.e.description: Enable/disable snippet completions for class members.
typescript.suggest.classMemberSnippets.e.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.classMemberSnippets.enabled#` instead.

typescript.suggest.completeFunctionCalls.description: Complete functions with their parameter signature.
typescript.suggest.completeFunctionCalls.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.completeFunctionCalls#` instead.

typescript.suggest.completeJSDocs.description: Enable/disable suggestion to complete JSDoc comments.
typescript.suggest.completeJSDocs.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.completeJSDocs#` instead.

typescript.suggest.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.enabled#` instead.

typescript.suggest.includeAutomaticOptio.description: Enable/disable showing completions on potentially undefined values that insert an optional chain call. Requires strict null checks to be enabled.
typescript.suggest.includeAutomaticOptio.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.includeAutomaticOptionalChainCompletions#` instead.

typescript.suggest.includeCompletionsFor.description: Enable/disable auto-import-style completions on partially-typed import statements.
typescript.suggest.includeCompletionsFor.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.includeCompletionsForImportStatements#` instead.

typescript.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns#` instead.
typescript.suggest.jsdoc.generateReturns.markdownDescription: Enable/disable generating `@returns` annotations for JSDoc templates.

typescript.suggest.objectLiteralMethodSn.description: Enable/disable snippet completions for methods in object literals.
typescript.suggest.objectLiteralMethodSn.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.objectLiteralMethodSnippets.enabled#` instead.

typescript.suggest.paths.description: Enable/disable suggestions for paths in import statements and require calls.
typescript.suggest.paths.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggest.paths#` instead.

typescript.suggestionActions.enabled.description: Enable/disable suggestion diagnostics for TypeScript files in the editor.
typescript.suggestionActions.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.suggestionActions.enabled#` instead.

typescript.tsc.autoDetect.description: Controls auto detection of tsc tasks.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Create both build and watch tasks.
Disable this feature.
Only create single run compile tasks.
Only create compile and watch tasks.

typescript.tsdk.markdownDescription:
Specifies the folder path to the tsserver and `lib*.d.ts` files under a TypeScript install to use for IntelliSense, for example: `./node_modules/typescript/lib`.

- When specified as a user setting, the TypeScript version from `typescript.tsdk` automatically replaces the built-in TypeScript version.
- When specified as a workspace setting, `typescript.tsdk` allows you to switch to use that workspace version of TypeScript for IntelliSense with the `TypeScript: Select TypeScript version` command.

See the [TypeScript documentation](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/typescript/typescript-compiling#_using-newer-typescript-versions) for more detail about managing TypeScript versions.

typescript.tsserver.enableTracing.description: Enables tracing TS server performance to a directory. These trace files can be used to diagnose TS Server performance issues. The log may contain file paths, source code, and other potentially sensitive information from your project.

typescript.tsserver.log.description: Enables logging of the TS server to a file. This log can be used to diagnose TS Server issues. The log may contain file paths, source code, and other potentially sensitive information from your project.

typescript.tsserver.maxTsServerMemory.markdownDescription: The maximum amount of memory (in MB) to allocate to the TypeScript server process. To use a memory limit greater than 4 GB, use `#typescript.tsserver.nodePath#` to run TS Server with a custom Node installation.

typescript.tsserver.nodePath.description: Run TS Server on a custom Node installation. This can be a path to a Node executable, or 'node' if you want VS Code to detect a Node installation.

typescript.tsserver.pluginPaths.description: Additional paths to discover TypeScript Language Service plugins.

items.description: Either an absolute or relative path. Relative path will be resolved against workspace folder(s).

typescript.tsserver.useSyntaxServer.description: Controls if TypeScript launches a dedicated server to more quickly handle syntax related operations, such as computing code folding.
enumDescriptions: Use a lighter weight syntax server to handle all IntelliSense operations. This disables project-wide features including auto-imports, cross-file completions, and go to definition for symbols in other files. Only use this for very large projects where performance is critical.
Don't use a dedicated syntax server. Use a single server to handle all IntelliSense operations.
Spawn both a full server and a lighter weight server dedicated to syntax operations. The syntax server is used to speed up syntax operations and provide IntelliSense while projects are loading.

typescript.tsserver.watchOptions.description: Configure which watching strategies should be used to keep track of files and directories.

oneOf.description: Use VS Code's file watchers instead of TypeScript's. Requires using TypeScript 5.4+ in the workspace.

fallbackPolling.description: When using file system events, this option specifies the polling strategy that gets used when the system runs out of native file watchers and/or doesn't support native file watchers.
enumDescriptions: Check every file for changes several times a second at a fixed interval.
Check every file for changes several times a second, but use heuristics to check certain types of files less frequently than others.
configuration.tsserver.watchOptions.fallbackPolling.dynamicPriorityPolling

synchronousWatchDirectory.description: Disable deferred watching on directories. Deferred watching is useful when lots of file changes might occur at once (e.g. a change in node_modules from running npm install), but you might want to disable it with this flag for some less-common setups.

watchDirectory.description: Strategy for how entire directory trees are watched under systems that lack recursive file-watching functionality.
enumDescriptions: Polls directories in chunks at regular interval.
Check every directory for changes several times a second at a fixed interval.
Use a dynamic queue where less-frequently modified directories will be checked less often.
Attempt to use the operating system/file system's native events for directory changes.

watchFile.description: Strategy for how individual files are watched.
enumDescriptions: Polls files in chunks at regular interval.
Check every file for changes several times a second at a fixed interval.
Check every file for changes several times a second, but use heuristics to check certain types of files less frequently than others.
Use a dynamic queue where less-frequently modified files will be checked less often.
Attempt to use the operating system/file system's native events for file changes.
Attempt to use the operating system/file system's native events to listen for changes on a file's containing directories. This can use fewer file watchers, but might be less accurate.

typescript.tsserver.web.projectWideIntel.description: Enable/disable project-wide IntelliSense on web. Requires that VS Code is running in a trusted context.

Suppresses semantic errors on web even when project wide IntelliSense is enabled. This is always on when project wide IntelliSense is not enabled or available. See `#typescript.tsserver.web.projectWideIntellisense.enabled#`

typescript.tsserver.web.typeAcquisition..description: Enable/disable package acquisition on the web. This enables IntelliSense for imported packages. Requires `#typescript.tsserver.web.projectWideIntellisense.enabled#`. Currently not supported for Safari.

typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabl.description: Enable/disable automatic updating of import paths when you rename or move a file in VS Code.
typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabl.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled#` instead.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Prompt on each rename.
Always update paths automatically.
Never rename paths and don't prompt.

typescript.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled#` instead.
typescript.updateImportsOnPaste.enabled.markdownDescription: Automatically update imports when pasting code. Requires TypeScript 5.6+.

typescript.workspaceSymbols.excludeLibra.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.workspaceSymbols.excludeLibrarySymbols#` instead.
typescript.workspaceSymbols.excludeLibra.markdownDescription: Exclude symbols that come from library files in `Go to Symbol in Workspace` results. Requires using TypeScript 5.3+ in the workspace.

enumDescriptions: Search all open JavaScript or TypeScript projects for symbols.
Only search for symbols in the current JavaScript or TypeScript project.
typescript.workspaceSymbols.scope.markdownDeprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated. Use `#js/ts.workspaceSymbols.scope#` instead.
typescript.workspaceSymbols.scope.markdownDescription: Controls which files are searched by [Go to Symbol in Workspace](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/editingevolved#_open-symbol-by-name).
